name: Enter the Dojo
description: Dive into Dojo, a provable game engine and toolchain for building onchain games and autonomous worlds with Cairo. Join us for an in depth walk though of the toolchain, its architecture and its features and limitations.

speakers.name: Tarrence Van As
speakers.bio: Tarrence has been building onchain games and tooling for the last two years, starting with the creation of Dope Wars. Today he is the founder of Catrdige Gaming Company and leads the development of Dojo.
